briefTitle: Immunogenicity and Safety Study of GSK Biologicals' Meningococcal Conjugate Vaccine When Co-administered With Routine Vaccines in Healthy Infants and Toddlers
officialTitle: Immunogenicity and Safety Study of GSK Biologicals' Meningococcal Conjugate Vaccine (GSK 134612) When Co-administered With Routine Vaccines in Healthy Infants and Toddlers
summary: This study evaluates the immunogenicity and safety of the meningococcal conjugate vaccine GSK 134612 in healthy infants, when co-administered with other infant vaccines, on three different dose schedules.
